title: Episode 697 - Special Guest Noah Elias
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with the owner of Stars And Stripes Company, Noah Elias, to discuss The Rock’s steroid schedule, his love of woodworking, and Cocaine.
